article_title: While The Fed Is Pressing The Gas, Congress Is Hitting The Brakes

article_metadata.description: Although the Fed is pressing on the economic gas pedal, Congress is hitting the brakes. Why? Read this article to get the facts on what the media continues to ignore, but what every citizen needs to know!
article_metadata.author: Mike Patton
